page.title: 04S.CROYDON CHILD _ TUESDAY
page.content: When I wake up in the morning I get up, go downstairs,make my own packed lunch,go upstairs,have a wash,clean my teeth,get dressed,pack my school bag and leave for school by car.I am at school from 9.00.a.m. until 3.30.p.m. My mum collects me;we go home.I watch T.V.then change out of my school clothes and go outside and play.Later I come in,lay the table and we have our tea.I wash up somtimes,watch more T.V.,get ready for Brownies next day and then get washed and read for half an hour before I got to sleep. On other days I am much busier.I go to Brownies, help with the shopping, go to church parade and go swimming.
